Write, Version, Merge. Let's Treat Docs Like Code

When you want to write more, write better, merge drafts, and write with others.

Coming Soon

Docs like code means treating docs as artfully and mindfully as code. Let's find out the best practices and create a balance point between artisanal craft and automation efficiency.

In the mean time, read these blog posts written about real-world experiences treating docs like code.
